events.message: The customer submitted a claim after a car collision that occurred on 2024-05-30 involving their vehicle and another car at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under the 'Auto Accident' cluster due to keywords pertaining to vehicle collision and accident reported by the customer.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to guide the customer through the claims process and answer any questions related to the accident.
The insurance company officially acknowledged receipt of the customer's auto accident claim and confirmed that it is now under review.
Request was sent to the customer for additional documents including police report, vehicle damage photos, and repair estimates to proceed with claim investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents promptly including the police report, photos of the damaged car, and quotes from certified repair shops.
An internal investigation team commenced their review of the submitted documents and details surrounding the auto accident to assess the claim validity.
The investigation concluded successfully, verifying that the claim is legitimate and that damages to the vehicle align with the reported accident.
A settlement amount was proposed based on repair estimates and policy coverage, and a detailed explanation was sent to the customer for review.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the timely communication and support from the agent.
The claim was officially approved by the insurance company, confirming coverage of the agreed settlement amount under the policy terms.
The settlement payment was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s registered bank account to cover the vehicle repair costs.
Following successful payment issuance and confirmation from the customer, the claim was officially closed in the system.
